PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语反义词 - 豆丁网 ... discharge 解雇>雇佣 discombobulate 扰乱>调解 discommode 使为难>施恩惠.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(D) ... discolorment 变色 discombobulate 使混乱 discomfiture 挫折.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... discombobulate 扰乱，使困惑 discombobulated 扰乱的，打乱的 discomfit 使懊恼；使难堪.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... disclose 使某物显露 discombobulate 扰乱，使困惑 discombobulated 扰乱的，打乱的.

jack withdiscombobulated 使混乱;破坏,打乱计划leave somebody in the lurch 在某人需要帮助时弃之不顾.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: probably based on discompose or discomfit

means.word_mean: 2. be confusing or perplexing to; cause to be unable to think clearly;
